item.title: Verification of hoax spread in Declaration of Emergency on April 1
item.description: #Introduction On the evening of March 30, 2020, rumors spread that the government would issue an emergency declaration on April 1 and lockdown the city on the next two days. In FIJ (Fact Check Initiative), which promotes the spread of fact check in Japan, this issue is taken as one of the unreliable information. Government announces emergency on April 1st, lockdown on 2nd â€“ spread via LINE, etc. At a press conference that evening, Chief Cabinet Secretary Kan clearly denied the rumor 1.
